subdisciplines.name: Fiscal policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the government's use of revenue collection and spending, including taxation and public debt, to influence the economy.

subdisciplines.name: Public choice theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of individuals and organizations in the public sector, including their decision-making processes and outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how economic activity impacts the environment and how environmental policies can affect economic outcomes.
